app_descript:
Brief: Wyze is an integral companion app for all Wyze products, enhancing the smart home experience. With a substantial update in its service offerings, Wyze stands as a keystone in seamless home automation and monitoring. Amidst evolving features, the app introduces a revised pricing plan while offering additional capabilities to ensure your home remains secure and intelligently connected.

Price: Wyze offers a tiered pricing structure. The app is free to download, but starting from April 6th, the 24/7 professional monitoring service is available at $9.99 per month for new subscribers, with the initial rate of $4.99 per month honored for current subscribers and those who sign up before the deadline. Additional in-app purchases may apply for extended features. ğŸ’µ
